title: No Better God
description:
Kal and Luke start this discussion on the book "Saying No to God" by Matthew Korpman.  They move on to the topics of biblical interpretation, authorial intent, a little soteriology, and Luke also expresses his deep admiration for St. Paul's ability to articulate the profound.

Podcast featuring a discussion with Matthew Korpman and his book:
https://podcasts.google.com/feed/aHR0cHM6Ly9mZWVkcy5idXp6c3Byb3V0LmNvbS8yNjU4ODAucnNz/episode/ZDQxOTlmZGYtNGVmMi00NGMxLTgyMDMtMWE0ZDM2YjFkY2I1?ep=14

Kal's podcast, "Universalism Against the World": https://anchor.fm/kaliya-rivet
